mosinstall.description: Add a Table of Contents functionality to a paginated item. Syntax: {mospagebreak} or {mospagebreak title=The page title} or {mospagebreak heading=The first page} or {mospagebreak title=The page title&heading=The first page} or {mospagebreak heading=The first page&title=The page title}

param.name: title
param.label: Site&Page Title
param.description: Title and Heading attibutes from mambot added to Site Title and the Page Title

param.name: separator
param.label: Separator
param.description: Allows you to control the separator between the article title and the page title as defined by using the `title` attribute for this mambot
